name: Spray Paint Simulator 2k18
description:
Now you too can be a starving artist on the streets of your favorite tourist city!

Make your own spray paint art using stencils and eight whole colors! (Plus the colors that occur when they mix, don't be ridiculous.) Use stencils to paint your favorite tourist attractions like the Colosseum, the Leaning Tower of Pisa, Cartoon Tiger, and Small Circle.

The RPI game jam version only lets you use one stencil at a time (and prevents you from painting anywhere that isn't inside the stencil) but the full version lets you combine stencils, use the edges as a stencil, and more!

Full screen is f2, m is a shortcut for moving stencils, s is a shortcut for switching to spray paint, f1 is a screenshot of the whole screen (not just the painting like the save button is).

Note: The save button saves images to %appdata%\Spray Paint Simulator 2k18 on windows and User/Libray/Application Support/Spray Paint Simulator 2k18/ on Mac.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Inspired by the street artists in Rome who create rather impressive works of art with spray paint, stencils, and the like right in front of you.

Made on a plane and in a house and on a bus and in a dorm!

Made with help from Tristan Protzman.
